fields.title: My First Blog
fields.content: I will share my experiences with you.

fields.title: Role of Journalism
fields.summary:
Journalism plays a very important role in democratic societies.

One of its main purposes is to supply voters with the information they need to make informed choices, for example, about how they are going to vote in an election.

The democratic principle of ‘freedom of speech’ - meaning that people have the right to freely express their views and opinions, and to question or criticise the government - is enabled by a free, independent media.
fields.content:
Journalism is the process of collecting, writing, editing, and sharing news and related commentary through various media platforms. It can include newspapers, magazines, radio, television, and the internet. 
Journalism can also be defined as an academic study that focuses on the collection and editing of news or the management of a news medium. 
Some things to consider when writing journalistically include:
Audience: Consider who will be reading or watching your piece.
Tone: Consider the tone of your piece.
Accuracy, brevity, and clarity: Follow the basics of news writing, which are accuracy, brevity, and clarity. 
Journalism has many different types, including: enlightenment journalism, entertainment journalism, advocacy journalism, and gatekeeping or mediative journalism. 
One of the most debated aspects of journalism is the pursuit of professional objectivity in the face of its relationship with political and economic actors.
